name: WORK_ITEM_ID
description: The identifier of the work item linked to the issue.

name: ISSUE_ID
description: The unique identifier of the issue.

name: STREAM_NAME
description: The name of the stream or code branch associated with the issue.

name: RELEASE
description: The release version or name that the issue is part of.

name: WORK_ITEM_STATUS
description: The current status of the work item (New, In review, Checked in, Completed).

name: COMMIT_ID
description: The identifier of the code commit associated with the issue or work item.

name: CHECK_IN_DATE
description: The date when the commit was checked into the version control system.
